author: Special Correspondent
text:
Vitthal Radadia, BJP MP from Porbandar, has been caught on camera kicking an old man at a music event in his constituency.

In a video that surfaced on social media, the MP is seen repeatedly kicking an old man.

As the video became viral on social media platforms such as WhatsApp, Facebook and Twitter, even local news channels began airing the clip.

However, there was no confirmation about the date and location of the incident, but according to sources, it occurred in a music event in a village in his constituency.

Mr. Radadia had sparked a controversy in October, 2012, after brandishing a gun at a toll booth employee when he was asked to pay toll tax.
title: BJP MP kicks out old man at music event
